Vlad sudenly jumped as the three other machines arrived.

Vlad: What is that mockery? I may look like a machine, but I am a 
human, genetically bred to be one of the finest warriors this galaxy 
has known.

He was stunned for a moment, but he did not fear. Fear was not for 
him, but for the lower castes. He turned to his unknown companion.

Vlad: The Trial I proposed will have to wait. (He turned to the 
newcomers) What are you all? Sentient robots? Who programmed you?
